Name: Dr. Karen Adams
Title: Associate Professor of Mathematics
Bio: Dr. Adams teaches courses in Calculus, Discrete Mathematics, and Algebra and also supervises student teachers.

Name: Jessie Butcher
Title: Adjunct Professor
Bio: Professor Butcher teaches robotics. She coaches the Shepherd University Robotics Team which entered the VEX U college and university robotics competition for the first time in 2022.

Name: Dr. Mohammadreza Ghahremani
Title: Associate Professor of Computer and Information Sciences

Name: Dr. Osman Guzide
Title: Professor of Computer Science and Information Sciences
Bio:
CME Department Chair Dr. Osman Guzide teaches courses in networks and security.
Schedule.

Name: Nafiseh Jahanbakht
Title: Mathematics Lecturer
Bio: Ms. Jahanbakht teaches courses in mathematics.

Name: Dr. Weidong Liao
Title: Professor of Computer Science and Information Sciences
Bio: Dr. Weidong teaches courses in Web Programming and Windows Programming.

Name: Jason Miller
Title: Assistant Professor of Computer Science
Bio: Jason Miller develops software for bioinformatics. He has published over 30 peer-reviewed papers on genome assembly, DNA annotation, RNA expression, and machine learning.

Name: Dr. Donald Mills
Title: Assistant Professor of Mathematics
Bio: Dr. Mills conducts research on secure communications.

Name: Reza Mirdamadi
Title: Associate Professor of Engineering
Bio: Professor Mirdamadi teaches courses in engineering, robotics, and mathematics.

Name: Dr. Robert Monahan
Title: Mathematics Lecturer
Bio: Dr. Monahan teaches courses in mathematics.

Name: Ken Shaw
Title: Adjunct Professor
Bio: Professor Shaw teaches applied mathematics and statistics.

Name: Roger Snook
Title: Adjunct Professor
Office: Write c/o CME Department or visit www.linkedin.com/in/rogersnook
Bio: Professor Snook is a certified IBM cloud architect, author, inventor, and mobile app developer. He incorporates Enterprise Design Thinking in classes at Shepherd.

Name: Dr. Qing Wang
Title: Professor of Mathematics
Bio: Dr. Wang’s research is focused on modeling, simulation, and analysis of cancer tumors.
